Tutorial Quests.description.1206407043: A short set of quests to get you going.
Tutorial Quests.step 1.968595418: Defeat the Pokémon. Click to deal damage!
Tutorial Quests.step 2.1709200840: Capture 1 Pokémon. When you defeat a Pokémon, a Poké Ball is thrown and you have a chance to capture it.
Tutorial Quests.step 3.1219228208: Defeat 10 Pokémon on Route 2. Click Route 2 on the map to move there and begin fighting.
Tutorial Quests.step 4.61756390: Go back to Pallet Town and say bye to mom.
Tutorial Quests.step 6.2081090144: Talk to the Old Man in Viridian City to learn about catching.
Tutorial Quests.step 7.1163928124: Use what you've learned to catch 5 Pidgey. Talk to the Old Man again if you need a reminder.
Tutorial Quests.step 8.423645430: Buy the Dungeon Ticket from Viridian City Shop.
Tutorial Quests.step 9.474373239: Gather 50 Dungeon Tokens by (re)capturing Pokémon, then clear the Viridian Forest dungeon.
Tutorial Quests.step 10.811454536: Defeat Pewter City Gym. Click the town on the map to move there, then click the Gym button to start the battle.

Team Rocket.description.1768624503: Some nasty villains are up to no good.
Team Rocket.step 1.1963409303: Illegal activity is afoot. Clear the Rocket Game Corner in Celadon City.
Team Rocket.step 2.1639352651: Team Rocket has occupied Silph Co. Clear Silph Co. in Saffron City to find the Card Key.
Team Rocket.step 3.1377652403: Blue is getting in your way. Defeat him in Silph Co.
Team Rocket.step 4.586315752: Team Rocket has occupied Silph Co. Clear Silph Co. in Saffron City once more to foil their plans.
Team Rocket.step 5.1767666076: If you take down Team Rocket's leader one more time they will surely never come back from this! Clear Viridian City Gym.

Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.description.1545989310: Check the hints and bring Bill's Grandpa the Pokémon he wants to see.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 1.944745119: Talk to Bill's Grandpa in Bill's House.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 2.1095494877: Bill's Grandpa wants you to catch a Pokémon that is pink and like a balloon.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 3.2070079390: Show your Jigglypuff to Bill's Grandpa.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 4.1155611340: Bill's Grandpa wants you to catch a Pokémon that is round, blue, and has leaves growing on its head.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 5.2041197728: Show your Oddish to Bill's Grandpa.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 6.1258611199: Bill's Grandpa wants you to catch a Pokémon that has a red sphere in its body and is shaped like a star.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 7.896581185: Show your Staryu to Bill's Grandpa.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 8.1603570166: Bill's Grandpa wants you to catch a Pokémon that is very loyal and supposedly roars pretty well.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 9.1405390786: Show your Growlithe to Bill's Grandpa.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 10.2111121563: Bill's Grandpa wants you to catch a Pokémon that has a yellow body and red cheeks.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 11.798225758: Show your Pikachu to Bill's Grandpa.
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 12.123186284: Bill's Grandpa would like to have a battle with you!
Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt.step 13.167923376: Talk to Bill's Grandpa one last time.

Mining Expedition.step 1.147063903: Buy the Explorer Kit from Cinnabar Island Shop.

Bill's Errand.description.299812462: Bill has asked you to journey to the Sevii Islands with him to set up a digital connection to mainland Kanto.
Bill's Errand.step 1.966794650: Use the Subregional Travel button at the top of the map to travel to the Sevii Islands and speak with Celio on One Island.
Bill's Errand.step 2.148854616: Ask the Game Corner owner on Two Island about the meteorite.
Bill's Errand.step 3.858835684: A biker gang has invaded Three island. They will not let you continue to Berry Forest. Defeat the Biker Goons.
Bill's Errand.step 6.561336780: Lostelle has been found. Return to the Game Corner owner on Two Island.
Bill's Errand.step 7.568827479: Deliver the meteorite to Celio on One Island.

Persons of Interest.description.614532698: Some people want to talk to you.
Persons of Interest.step 1.1308619894: Talk to the Breeder in Saffron City.
Persons of Interest.step 2.1074433596: Talk to the Gem Scientist in Pewter City.

The Sick Ampharos.description.1008078946: Jasmine's Ampharos seems to be sick!
The Sick Ampharos.step 1.964636946: Clear the Olivine Lighthouse dungeon in Olivine City.
The Sick Ampharos.step 2.253531602: Talk to Jasmine in the Olivine Lighthouse.
The Sick Ampharos.step 3.1707171554: Talk to the Pharmacist in Cianwood City.
The Sick Ampharos.step 4.1371245231: The Pharmacist said he needs some time to finish Amphys medicine. Clear the Cianwood City Gym in the meantime.
The Sick Ampharos.step 5.1707171554: Talk to the Pharmacist in Cianwood City.
The Sick Ampharos.step 6.905126454: Give Amphy their medicine in the Olivine Lighthouse.
The Sick Ampharos.step 7.253531602: Talk to Jasmine in the Olivine Lighthouse.

Team Rocket Again.description.1416170930: Team Rocket is up to no good again!
Team Rocket Again.step 2.1184797232: Clear the Team Rocket's Hideout dungeon in Mahogany Town
Team Rocket Again.step 3.1832130684: Clear the Radio Tower dungeon in Goldenrod City

The Legendary Beasts.description.888288810: Investigate the legends surrounding the strange Burned Tower in Ecruteak City.

Eusine's Chase.step 7.1666908853: Talk to Eusine in Vermilion City.

Rainbow Guardian.step 1.1490981420: Meet the Kimono Girls at the Ecruteak Dance Theatre.
Rainbow Guardian.step 2.746603139: Prove your abilities as a trainer to the Kimono Girls of Ecruteak City.
Rainbow Guardian.step 3.461945008: Catch Ho-Oh in the Tin Tower.

Unfinished Business.step 1.1986079826: Talk to Professor Oak in Pallet Town.
Unfinished Business.step 2.1547142573: Talk to Professor Ivy in her lab in the Sevii Islands.
Unfinished Business.step 3.1457941137: Deliver the GS Ball to Professor Oak in Pallet Town.
Unfinished Business.step 4.422084776: Deliver the GS Ball to Kurt in Azalea Town in Johto.
Unfinished Business.step 5.1000750423: Talk to Kurt again after becoming Champion of Johto.
Unfinished Business.step 6.877483470: Talk to Professor Oak in Azalea Town.
Unfinished Business.step 7.622788299: Investigate the shrine in Ilex Forest.
Unfinished Business.step 9.877483470: Talk to Professor Oak in Azalea Town.
Unfinished Business.step 10.1908736223: Investigate the Time Distortion in Tohjo Falls.
Unfinished Business.step 12.877483470: Talk to Professor Oak in Azalea Town.
Unfinished Business.step 13.622788299: Investigate the shrine in Ilex Forest.
Unfinished Business.step 14.1193513983: Play with the Celebi in Ilex Forest.
Unfinished Business.step 15.877483470: Talk to Professor Oak in Azalea Town.

Land vs. Water.description.1495286274: Put a stop to the schemes of Team Aqua and Team Magma!
Land vs. Water.step 1.2076072304: Stop Team Magma at Mt. Chimney Crater.
Land vs. Water.step 2.1599182850: Stop Team Aqua at the Weather Institute.
Land vs. Water.step 5.1729036597: Team Aqua's leader Archie escaped from their hideout. Find him in the Seafloor Cavern and put a stop to this once and for all!

The Weather Trio.description.156841683: Put an ancient battle to rest.
The Weather Trio.step 1.2055357902: Investigate the commotion in Sootopolis City.
The Weather Trio.step 2.84524639: Explore the Cave of Origin to find Wallace.
The Weather Trio.step 3.1463313100: Talk to Wallace in the Cave of Origin to learn how to stop Kyogre and Groudon from fighting.
The Weather Trio.step 4.741839301: Climb the Sky Pillar to find the super-ancient Pokémon Rayquaza.
The Weather Trio.step 5.558384862: Return to Sootopolis City to see what Rayquaza will do.
The Weather Trio.step 6.1619532594: Talk to Wallace in the Cave of Origin about the aftermath of the battle.

Mystery of Deoxys.step 4.328569857: Enter the Battle Frontier and defeat stage 100.

The Eon Duo.description.1305113103: Track down the elusive Eon Duo.
The Eon Duo.step 1.886497539: Watch a news report in Littleroot Town about a mysterious Pokémon.
The Eon Duo.step 2.1931130527: Change channels to watch a different TV station in Littleroot town.
The Eon Duo.step 3.1257854447: Go to Hoenn Pokémon League to claim your Eon ticket.
The Eon Duo.step 4.1825468718: Claim your Eon Ticket in the Start Menu and investigate the Southern Island.

Celio's Errand.description.1441283841: Celio has asked you to help him set up a digital connection between the Sevii Islands and Hoenn.

Celio's Errand.step 2.2007987072: Eavesdrop on the Team Rocket Grunts at Mt. Ember.

Celio's Errand.step 5.1006705966: Take the Ruby in Ruby Path
Celio's Errand.step 6.1281970850: Return the Ruby to Celio on One Island
Celio's Errand.step 7.1637184312: Help Lorelei with Team Rocket Grunts by clearing Icefall Cave on Four Island.
Celio's Errand.step 8.1380464267: Talk to Lorelei in Icefall Cave
Celio's Errand.step 9.1435544872: Talk to Gideon in Dotted Hole
Celio's Errand.step 10.610072654: Defeat the Three Team Rocket Grunts in Rocket Warehouse.
Celio's Errand.step 11.2140297234: Defeat Team Rocket Executive Ariana in Rocket Warehouse.
Celio's Errand.step 12.1650560149: Defeat Team Rocket Executive Archer in Rocket Warehouse.
Celio's Errand.step 13.1615985846: Defeat Scientist Gideon to reclaim the Sapphire.
Celio's Errand.step 14.1215643078: Return the Sapphire to Celio on One Island

Team Rocket's Pinkan Theme Park.description.1766958488: Help Team Rocket build a theme park on Pinkan Island?
Team Rocket's Pinkan Theme Park.step 1.771448609: Talk to Team Rocket on Pinkan Island to hear about their plans.
Team Rocket's Pinkan Theme Park.step 2.1621394790: Mutate and harvest 1 Pinkan Berry at the farm.
Team Rocket's Pinkan Theme Park.step 3.1613257932: Help Team Rocket recruit some Pinkan Pokémon
Team Rocket's Pinkan Theme Park.step 4.432774138: Collect Fairy Gems and Pixie Plates
Team Rocket's Pinkan Theme Park.step 5.1715612715: Talk to Team Rocket on Pinkan Island to open the theme park!
Team Rocket's Pinkan Theme Park.step 6.378872660: Defeat Team Rocket Jessie & James on Pinkan Island.
Team Rocket's Pinkan Theme Park.step 7.224406544: Oh no! Officer Jenny has showed up. She's not happy! No time to plead your case, it's time to battle!

The Three Golems.description.36145889: Discover the secrets of the Sealed Chamber.
The Three Golems.step 1.437816859: Enter the Sealed Chamber to find clues.
The Three Golems.step 2.1588856200: Investigate the strange markings in the Sealed Chamber.
The Three Golems.step 3.1208797436: Navigate the maze inside the Sealed Chamber.
The Three Golems.step 4.1208797436: Navigate the maze inside the Sealed Chamber.
The Three Golems.step 5.1208797436: Navigate the maze inside the Sealed Chamber.
The Three Golems.step 6.1208797436: Navigate the maze inside the Sealed Chamber.
The Three Golems.step 7.1208797436: Navigate the maze inside the Sealed Chamber.
The Three Golems.step 8.893028607: Investigate the hidden message at the end of the Sealed Chamber maze.
The Three Golems.step 9.559288388: Explore Hoenn by defeating Pokémon on the hinted routes to release the Regi Trio.

Wish Maker.description.2077946476: Harness the power of the Millennium Comet and make a wish!
Wish Maker.step 1.320425594: Attend the opening ceremony of the Millennium Festival near Lavaridge Town.
Wish Maker.step 2.1819743234: Defeat Team Rocket Jessie & James at the Millennium Festival near Lavaridge Town.
Wish Maker.step 3.504277161: Learn the legend of the Millennium Comet from Butler near Lavaridge Town.
Wish Maker.step 4.198027991: Climb to the Mt. Chimney Crater to get a better view of the Millennium Comet as it passes.
Wish Maker.step 5.434588865: You are being stalked by Absol, the Disaster Pokémon. Capture it or hatch your own to befriend it.
Wish Maker.step 6.639535751: Examine the crystalline cocoon Butler gave you while at the Mt. Chimney Crater.
Wish Maker.step 7.407964421: Butler has followed you to the Mt. Chimney Crater and is trying to kidnap Jirachi!
Wish Maker.step 8.1932153162: Butler has escaped through the Jagged Pass and hooked Jirachi up to some sort of machine. Fight him to free Jirachi.
Wish Maker.step 9.22155786: Butler's attempts to resurrect Groudon have gone terribly wrong! Fight the resulting abomination!
Wish Maker.step 10.1260637142: Jirachi has escaped in the chaos and is roaming Hoenn. Catch Jirachi.

A Meta Discovery.description.1799092966: Help Butler's wish come true, responsibly.
A Meta Discovery.step 1.261442075: Talk to Butler in the Jagged Pass to learn about his new plan.
A Meta Discovery.step 2.318166347: Gather the materials Butler needs to rebuild his resurrection machine.
A Meta Discovery.step 3.1862264459: Calibrate the machine by catching or hatching 5 Groudon
A Meta Discovery.step 4.1708328045: Deliver the materials to Butler in Mt. Chimney Crater and start the resurrection machine.
A Meta Discovery.step 5.360146674: Butler has revived Meta Groudon at Mt. Chimney Crater. Catch Meta Groudon.

Shadows in the Desert.description.1725155577: Explore Orre and uncover the origin of Shadow Pokémon.
Shadows in the Desert.step 1.126291075: Travel to Orre and explore the Outskirt Stand.
Shadows in the Desert.step 3.2121981968: Fight Folly the Shady Guy in Phenac City
Shadows in the Desert.step 4.375270254: Check what is in the mysterious sack.
Shadows in the Desert.step 5.710294776: Defeat 10 trainers who are using Shadow Pokémon in Phenac City.
Shadows in the Desert.step 6.933491292: Talk to the Mayor of Phenac City about the criminals you have been fighting.
Shadows in the Desert.step 7.1609121735: Meet up with Rui again in Phenac City.
Shadows in the Desert.step 8.399653736: Fight trainers in Pyrite Town to flush out the criminals.
Shadows in the Desert.step 9.1155390916: Talk to the distraught bodybuilder Duking in Pyrite Town.
Shadows in the Desert.step 10.223024200: Fight trainers in Pyrite Colosseum to flush out the criminals.
Shadows in the Desert.step 11.817751560: No sign of Shadow Pokémon so far. Fight trainers at the Pyrite Building to flush out the criminals.
Shadows in the Desert.step 12.981276457: Interrogate Hunter Doken in the Pyrite Building to find out who has taken Plusle, and where to.
Shadows in the Desert.step 13.2054257567: Find Miror B. and rescue Duking's Plusle in Pyrite Cave!
Shadows in the Desert.step 15.705808953: Discuss your next move with Rui at Pyrite Colosseum.
Shadows in the Desert.step 16.2121096715: Defeat the Team Cipher Peons looting Agate Village.
Shadows in the Desert.step 17.571654681: Rui is worried her grandpa is in trouble. Search for him by clearing Relic Cave.
Shadows in the Desert.step 18.1790385598: Find out more about Relic Cave from Grandpa Eagun.
Shadows in the Desert.step 19.649613821: There's rumors of more Team Cipher activity at Mt. Battle. Go investigate!
Shadows in the Desert.step 20.1840363755: Discuss your next move with Rui at Mt. Battle.
Shadows in the Desert.step 21.780480829: Track down the TV broadcast coming from The Under in Pyrite Town. Clear The Under.
Shadows in the Desert.step 22.159545105: Search Venus' Studio in the Under for clues.
Shadows in the Desert.step 23.242775263: Follow the secret tunnel to the Cipher Lab and clear out the enemies.
Shadows in the Desert.step 24.431859120: Team Cipher has taken over Realgam Tower! Fight to kick them out!
Shadows in the Desert.step 25.23323161: From the top of Realgam Tower, you see Mayor Es Cade. Go ask him for help.
Shadows in the Desert.step 26.1619711733: Team Cipher's leaders have holed up in the Realgam Colosseum. Fight them to end this once and for all!
Shadows in the Desert.step 27.120097571: Just when you have him cornered, Evice calls in a helicopter. Watch him escape the Realgam Colosseum.

A New World.description.547231379: End Team Galactic's plan to destroy the world and create a new one in its place.
A New World.step 1.1455481266: Team Galactic is stealing energy. Clear Valley Windworks.
A New World.step 2.710084311: Team Galactic is kidnapping Pokémon now. Clear Team Galactic Eterna Building in Eterna City.
A New World.step 3.799547421: All is quiet. Team Galactic isn't doing anything. Maybe they learned their lesson. Just keep traveling, I guess. Clear the Pastoria City Gym.
A New World.step 4.997291339: The boss of Team Galactic has been spotted in Celestic Town!
A New World.step 5.1804742296: Cyrus is gone. Nothing to do but proceed. Adventure awaits! Clear the Canalave City Gym.
A New World.step 6.2116246336: A commotion was heard at Lake Valor. You must protect the lake's guardian! Clear Lake Valor.
A New World.step 7.359918888: Lake Valor's guardian was taken. Better try again at the next lake. Clear Lake Verity.
A New World.step 8.776106435: Lake Verity's guardian was also taken. Only one lake remains. Clear Lake Acuity.
A New World.step 9.611926062: You failed to protect any of the lake guardians. They have been taken to Veilstone City. So that's what that strange building was... Clear Team Galactic HQ in Veilstone City.
A New World.step 10.1797323183: The lake guardians have been rescued, but Cyrus has used them to forge the Red Chain. He is taking it to the top of Mount Coronet. Follow him! Clear Spear Pillar.
A New World.step 11.322580208: Cyrus planned to use the Red Chain to enslave Dialga and Palkia, but he accidentally angered Giratina and has been taken to its realm. A portal has appeared on top of Mount Coronet. Use it to follow Cyrus and end his threat once and for all. Clear Distortion World.

Recover the Precious Egg!.description.68849519: A rare egg is at the Sandgem Lab! Surely it should be easy to hatch one little egg, right?
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 1.176758969: Speak to Professor Hastings in Sandgem Town.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 2.110794554: Search for clues in Eterna Forest.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 3.916848157: Catch or hatch 50 Water-type Pokémon, and see if those boulders are really just boulders.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 4.1463006703: Time to give those mysterious boulders the soaking of their life! Return to the Eterna Forest, and prepare for a battle.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 5.267628198: Speak to the Go-Rock Commander in the Eterna Forest.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 6.718022622: Chase the fleeing Go-Rock Squad through the Eterna Forest!
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 7.1250501179: Keep chasing the Go-Rock Squad through the Eterna Forest, but... didn't they already pass that tree?
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 8.1959178965: The Go-Rock Squad are definitely going in circles, but they're too dumb to realise it. Interrogate one on their method of navigating the Eterna Forest!
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 9.690654316: They're using Parasect to navigate the Eterna Forest. Clear out a Parasect and they should get trapped!
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 10.1083815642: Now you've muddied the path, continue the Eterna Forest chase!
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 11.825157950: You've cornered the Go-Rock Commander outside the Old Chateau! Time to finish this.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 12.662875099: Return the egg to Professor Hastings in Sandgem Town.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 13.911561341: Professor Hastings has headed off to Canalave to do more research on Manaphy. Check in on him when you can!
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 14.1277327240: A little girl's Happiny stole the egg! Search for witnesses east of Canalave!
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 15.1341120870: The Happiny headed north out of Jubilife! Ask for witnesses in the next town.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 16.1905809482: The Happiny went north, through the Eterna Forest. Ask if anyone's seen it in Eterna City.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 17.919432983: Search for someone who's seen the Happiny Egg-napper! It was last seen heading east across Route 211.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 18.777942451: Keep asking around and following the Happiny Egg-thief! It was heading south, towards Solaceon Town.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 19.1572544283: Hopefully you can finally catch up to this Happiny at Hearthome City. Ask around for any witnesses.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 20.106184730: The Happiny went through Mt. Coronet again? This time it went west through the Southern path. Ask around for witnesses on the other side.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 21.2120429404: The Happiny fled from Oreburgh and headed west, through the Oreburgh Gate. Search for another witness on the far side.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 22.487619569: Search for evidence of the Happiny's path after turning south from Jubilife City.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 23.1816337338: An ex-Go-Rock in Sandgem Town has turned to Pokémon Pinching, and wants to steal the egg first. But after all you've been through to get it, he's in for a rude awakening
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 24.335977947: After leaving Sandgem, the Happiny went south-east, across the water. There's only one place it could be now...
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 25.669480789: Oh no, you're not gonna let more boulders stop you now. Catch or hatch 50 Fighting-types and smash right through them.
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 26.1611279765: Time to head back to Pal Park and teach this little pink snot not to steal important eggs!
Recover the Precious Egg!.step 27.1775887423: The egg hatched after your battle with the egg-nappers! Bring Manaphy back to Hastings in Canalave City, and close off this mission for good.

Zero's Ambition.description.1831191088: Help Zero find an entrance to the Distortion World.
Zero's Ambition.step 1.398078898: Talk to Zero in the Fight Area.
Zero's Ambition.step 2.1082519883: Read the recently discovered book in Canalave City.
Zero's Ambition.step 3.44081679: Report to Zero what was in the book.
Zero's Ambition.step 4.2085149051: At Lake Verity, ask Mesprit about the Distortion World.
Zero's Ambition.step 6.809952328: At Lake Valor, ask Azelf about the Distortion World.
Zero's Ambition.step 8.382130070: At Lake Acuity, ask Uxie about the Distortion World.
Zero's Ambition.step 10.882346915: Clear Sendoff Spring to meet the Lake Trio.
Zero's Ambition.step 11.1324386104: Talk to the Lake Trio in Sendoff Spring.
Zero's Ambition.step 12.502958681: Charge the key to the Distortion World.
Zero's Ambition.step 13.81706452: Talk to Zero in Sendoff Spring.
Zero's Ambition.step 14.609165815: Defeat Zero to protect the key.
Zero's Ambition.step 15.489983333: Catch the ruler of the Distortion World.
Zero's Ambition.step 16.81706452: Talk to Zero in Sendoff Spring.

Hollow Truth and Ideals.description.2138702417: Prevent Team Plasma from using these dangerous Splicers.
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 1.1956916657: A Team Plasma Grunt in Virbank City would like to steal your Pokémon. Defeat the grunt.

Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 4.2069744124: Seems there's nothing suspicious going on in Castelia City. Time to continue your journey. Clear the Nimbasa Gym.
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 5.132168331: Hugh thinks some Team Plasma Grunts in Nimbasa City are stealing Pokémon. Defeat the grunts.
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 6.1839018942: They are definitely stealing Pokémon. Investigate the Totally Unsuspicious Frigate.
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 7.1674893239: Defeat the Team Plasma Grunts on the Totally Unsuspicious Frigate.
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 9.940019944: The Frigate is gone. Nothing to do but move forward. Clear route 13.
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 10.1218186736: You have stumbled upon Zinzolin and a Team Plasma Grunt in Lacunosa Town. Defeat the grunt.
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 12.198092113: Defeat the Opelucid City gym leader to obtain the DNA Splicers before Team Plasma does!
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 13.1188846969: Team Plasma has stolen the DNA Splicers and is assaulting the city with an army of grunts and shadows! Defend against the Team Plasma Assault!
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 16.516187675: Team Plasma has fled the scene with the stolen DNA Splicers. Find and clear out the Plasma Frigate.
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 17.87962819: Team Plasma's leader Ghetsis plans on using the DNA Splicers on Kyurem in Giant Chasm. Clear the dungeon to end his evil plans.
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 18.1404598542: Talk to Colress on the Plasma Frigate.
Hollow Truth and Ideals.step 22.1430144735: Ghetsis has done something to the legendary Dragon-type Pokémon inside Giant Chasm!

Swords of Justice.description.1417716951: The Swords of Justice sense something bad is about to happen, will you be able to help them out?
Swords of Justice.step 1.1386343740: Talk to the Old Man in Mistralton Cave for clues on where the Swords of Justice are.
Swords of Justice.step 2.540246376: Search around Mistralton Cave to see if you can find Cobalion, as the Old Man said.
Swords of Justice.step 3.1420254652: It looks like you've found Cobalion! Talk to them.
Swords of Justice.step 4.1743110085: Start reuniting the Swords of Justice once again. You should probably start looking for Terrakion around Unova's Victory Road.
Swords of Justice.step 5.2129048834: You've found Terrakion! Talk to them about the reunion.
Swords of Justice.step 6.758708724: Defeat Terrakion to prove you're worthy of their trust.
Swords of Justice.step 7.1764627375: Talk to Cobalion at the Moor of Icirrus to learn where to find Virizion.
Swords of Justice.step 8.707812433: Now that you know where to find Virizion, search for them in Pinwheel Forest.
Swords of Justice.step 9.2063994506: Now that you've found Virizion, tell them to meet the others at the Moor of Icirrus.
Swords of Justice.step 10.1247922527: Virizion is asking you to gather 5,000 Grass Gems to prove you're a trustworthy ally. Collect the gems and return to Pinwheel Forest to prove your worth.
Swords of Justice.step 11.1207847953: Now that you've gathered all of the Grass Gems, talk to Virizion in Pinwheel Forest once again.
Swords of Justice.step 12.1113832772: Meet up with the Swords of Justice at Moor of Icirrus and talk to Cobalion.
Swords of Justice.step 13.199797030: They need you to prove you're strong enough to deal with the possible dangers. Defeat the Swords of Justice!
Swords of Justice.step 14.995563644: Now that you've proven you're strong enough to help, take Cobalion's advice and search for Kyurem in the Giant Chasm.
Swords of Justice.step 15.221166466: Report your findings to Cobalion at the Moor of Icirrus.
Swords of Justice.step 16.161896130: Looks like Cobalion has seen Kyurem near Lacunosa Town. Go there and defeat Kyurem before it hurts any citizens.
Swords of Justice.step 17.2002439641: Seems like Kyurem has fled the town. You should talk to Cobalion while you're there.
Swords of Justice.step 18.7973695: Kyurem is probably hiding in the Giant Chasm. Find its lair.
Swords of Justice.step 19.1395832306: You've finally found Kyurem! Defeat it with the help of the Swords of Justice.
Swords of Justice.step 20.1550283261: Kyurem has injured the Swords of Justice, go check on Cobalion.
Swords of Justice.step 21.1574905850: Defeat Kyurem and stop it from causing any more harm!
Swords of Justice.step 22.930329406: You've finally defeated Kyurem, sealing it within the Giant Chasm forever. Talk to the Swords of Justice in the Giant Chasm.
Swords of Justice.step 23.833915869: The Swords of Justice all depart for their homes to wait for your arrival. Go catch your new friends and add them to your team!

Detective Pikachu.description.467520037: Detective Pikachu's partner has gone missing, and he needs your help!

Detective Pikachu.step 4.1373473796: Detective Pikachu has an informant who knows more about the mysterious vial. Meet with him in Saffron City.
Detective Pikachu.step 5.2145460197: The informant is proving hard to convince. Time to get physical!

Detective Pikachu.step 10.1730991226: Search the research laboratory for clues.

Detective Pikachu.step 13.287905865: Confront Howard Clifford in Goldenrod City about his involvement with the R vials.
Detective Pikachu.step 15.141927661: Give Howard Clifford one last chance to surrender!
Detective Pikachu.step 16.704715007: Defeat Mewtwo to free it from Howard's control!
Detective Pikachu.step 17.1758613: Talk to Mewtwo near Cerulean Cave about Detective Pikachu's partner.

A Beautiful World.description.933573659: End Team Flare's plan to destroy the world and create a new one in its place.
A Beautiful World.step 1.1843170376: Talk to Lysandre inside Professor Sycamore's lab in Lumiose City.
A Beautiful World.step 2.1818819433: Well, that was definitely a weird guy... Seems like Calem wants to meet you somewhere in Lumiose City, go talk with him.
A Beautiful World.step 4.616342292: Clear Glittering Cave and find the scientist.
A Beautiful World.step 5.1717101215: It seems that Team Flare Grunt is holding the scientist captive, free him!
A Beautiful World.step 6.1256099978: From what you gathered, Team Flare wanted to sell fossils for money. Talk with the fossil scientist you just rescued in Glittering Cave.
A Beautiful World.step 7.372545423: With interesting thoughts about Team Flare in your head, you decide to challenge the Cyllage City Gym to become stronger.
A Beautiful World.step 8.1914322475: You can see in Geosenge Town the Team Flare Grunt you battled earlier. Approach him once more.
A Beautiful World.step 9.2069940953: Beat the Team Flare Grunt once more!
A Beautiful World.step 10.133736572: You heard rumors of Diantha being in Coumarine City. Go there to check if you can see her.
A Beautiful World.step 11.1446454973: Lysandre is calling you while you are standing in Coumarine City, pick up the phone.
A Beautiful World.step 12.825818130: Well, that was extremely awkward... But ignoring that, Lumiose City still hasn't fixed the power outage, go clear the Kalos Power Plant.
A Beautiful World.step 13.1693662398: You've helped with the power outage problem, now the gym in Lumiose City is back up and you can challenge it!
A Beautiful World.step 14.1344317681: Professor Sycamore wants to meet you in Lumiose City. He's with Lysandre, go say hi.
A Beautiful World.step 15.1939401582: For someone so obsessed with beauty he seems to really care about filth... Anyway, the Poké Ball Factory sounds like a fun place, let's go check it out.
A Beautiful World.step 16.217083340: Now that Team Flare is not in the Poké Ball Factory anymore, talk with the Director that you just saved.
A Beautiful World.step 17.136284020: Professor Sycamore is waiting for you in Dendemille Town. He has some important things to say about the legendary Pokémon of Kalos.
A Beautiful World.step 18.1080266809: You were going to Frost Cavern for Pokémon, but what you found there is Team Flare instead! Clear it!
A Beautiful World.step 19.1505915052: So everything is over now, right? Right? Go beat Anistar City Gym!
A Beautiful World.step 20.1837115418: Lysandre is giving an important speech through the TV News. Watch it in Anistar City.
A Beautiful World.step 21.1986935964: Wow! Absolutely no one could have seen this coming! You think you might find Lysandre in Lumiose City where you first met him. Look for him!
A Beautiful World.step 22.1252372592: Show Team Flare Lysandre the strength of your convictions in Lumiose City!
A Beautiful World.step 23.1199364888: You run after Lysandre and while going through the Labs you find a jailed mysterious man in Lumiose City. It seems like he has a story to tell...
A Beautiful World.step 24.586405328: Now that you learnt what the ultimate weapon is able to do, you need to stop it. Team Flare Xerosic is in the way in Lumiose City, defeat him!
A Beautiful World.step 25.1441176026: Xerosic offers you the possibility to stop the ultimate weapon in Lumiose City. Blue or Red Button, press one!
A Beautiful World.step 26.1610657686: The ultimate weapon was activated in Geosenge Town! Go to the Team Flare Secret HQ to put a stop to it! First step: Beating Team Flare Aliana.
A Beautiful World.step 27.215175280: Continue traversing through the Team Flare Secret HQ! Second step: Beating Team Flare Celosia.
A Beautiful World.step 28.2147351262: You should be halfway through. Go further in the Team Flare Secret HQ! Third step: Beating Team Flare Bryony.
A Beautiful World.step 29.1417550905: You are getting close. Resume delving into the Team Flare Secret HQ! Fourth step: Beating Team Flare Mable.
A Beautiful World.step 30.638363746: You are almost there! One more time traversing through the Team Flare Secret HQ and you'll get to the end! Fifth step: Beating Team Flare Lysandre.
A Beautiful World.step 31.1803654314: This is it, you've beaten Lysandre at the top of his game in Team Flare Secret HQ, right? He might have something else to say...
A Beautiful World.step 32.979133578: You go to the lowest level of the Team Flare Secret HQ as Lysandre told you to. There you find Xerneas and Yveltal fighting each other! Fight them yourself and calm them down!
A Beautiful World.step 33.1539871950: Lysandre appears menacingly in front of you in Team Flare Secret HQ. He doesn't seem fazed about you subsiding both legendary Pokémon.
A Beautiful World.step 34.1047531517: Stop Team Flare Boss Lysandre in Team Flare Secret HQ once and for all!!
A Beautiful World.step 35.184540744: You did it! You saved Kalos! There is nothing else to do except to continue your journey to beat the Kalos Pokémon League!
A Beautiful World.step 36.526524186: What an amazing trainer! You became Kalos Champion! There is a parade in your honor in Lumiose City. But wait, AZ is there asking you for a battle. Show him what being a Pokémon Trainer is like!

Princess Diancie.description.2072227846: Princess Diancie has been spotted in Kalos! She's searching for something.
Princess Diancie.step 1.1090659266: Capture or hatch 100 Fairy-type Pokémon to follow Diancie's Fairy Aura.
Princess Diancie.step 2.2004973704: Defend Diancie from the attacking ninja in Shalour City.
Princess Diancie.step 3.1268362970: Diancie has escaped to the shopping mall in Lumiose City, but is under attack again!
Princess Diancie.step 4.505743912: Diancie has fled to the Diamond Domain. Dig in the Underground to find it.
Princess Diancie.step 5.1560621343: Millis and Argus Steel let you do the hard work while they set up an ambush in Shalour City.
Princess Diancie.step 6.1357699989: Millis and Argus Steel fled but their Aegislash stayed behind. Look for it in Shalour City and find out what it wants!
Princess Diancie.step 7.1712961243: Diancie needs help building a Heart Diamond to stabilize the Diamond Domain. Gather some Fairy Gems for her.
Princess Diancie.step 8.361689613: Talk to Princess Diancie in Shalour City.
Princess Diancie.step 10.1743532480: A rampaging Yveltal is threatening the Diamond Domain! Help Diancie defeat it!

An Unrivaled Power.description.1252318376: It has been said that Mewtwo can Mega Evolve. Search for clues on how to find its Mega Stones, so you can control this unrivaled power.
An Unrivaled Power.step 1.50938324: Red might know something. Fight him at Indigo Plateau Kanto then ask him what he knows.
An Unrivaled Power.step 2.1092430664: .....right. Of course..... Well, you have no leads for now, so may as well defeat and catch some Psychic and Fighting-type Pokémon.

An Unrivaled Power.step 5.1316395192: Look for Blue's old rival in Cerulean Cave
An Unrivaled Power.step 6.1052579717: You eventually found a trainer standing where Mewtwo once did in Cerulean Cave. Talk to Green.

An Unrivaled Power.step 8.1704135047: Talk to Green in Cerulean Cave.
An Unrivaled Power.step 9.823169634: Talk to Anomaly Mewtwo in Cerulean Cave.
An Unrivaled Power.step 10.1557952985: Mewtwo wishes to find a place it can live undisturbed. You know of such a place, but it seems unwilling to listen. Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo near Cerulean Cave so you may attempt to talk to it.
An Unrivaled Power.step 11.727537306: It escaped to the west. Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo again.
An Unrivaled Power.step 12.1112865426: It changed form and flew off in the direction of the sea. Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo yet again.
An Unrivaled Power.step 13.436886968: It flew off to the peak of a great mountain. Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo yet again.
An Unrivaled Power.step 14.1912879135: It flew off to a faraway region to hide in a large city. Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo yet again.
An Unrivaled Power.step 15.169631639: Talk to Anomaly Mewtwo in Pokémon Village.
An Unrivaled Power.step 16.1529364460: Gather the Great Twisted Spoon, Psychic Gems, and Fighting Gems for Mewtwo.
An Unrivaled Power.step 17.169631639: Talk to Anomaly Mewtwo in Pokémon Village.
An Unrivaled Power.step 18.1455326949: Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo in Pokémon Village.
An Unrivaled Power.step 19.169631639: Talk to Anomaly Mewtwo in Pokémon Village.

Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!.description.1484916147: Time to kick off your Alolan vacation! See the sights around Melemele Island.

Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!.step 2.453112107: Ask the mysterious girl if she's okay.
Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!.step 3.432785912: Follow Lillie to the Trainers' School dungeon and clear it.

Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!.step 6.1373440309: Clear Ilima's Trial at Verdant Cavern.

Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!.step 8.990474573: Nebby escaped into a hole! Clear the Seaward Cave dungeon.
Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!.step 9.872996226: The Ultra Recon Squad is awaiting a battle in Seaward Cave. Show them the thrill of the fight!
Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!.step 10.996800712: Return Nebby to Lillie in Melemele Meadow.
Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!.step 11.317684841: Lillie still has something on her mind. Talk to her in Iki Town.
Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!.step 12.1664407728: Defeat Hala in Iki Town to complete Melemele's Grand Trial!
Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!.step 13.1272179289: There is one more Z Crystal on Ten Carat Hill. Find the Trial Site and claim it!

Symbiotic Relations.description.448738796: Help Lillie and Nebby on Akala Island and meet some friendly faces.

Symbiotic Relations.step 2.922651593: Clear Lana's Trial at Brooklet Hill.
Symbiotic Relations.step 3.148636102: The Ultra Recon Squad is investigating an oddly familiar tree. Go check it out on Route 5.

Symbiotic Relations.step 6.961839021: Clear Mallow's Trial at Lush Jungle.

Emissary of Light.description.893377200: Seek out the Pokémon of Alola's legends on Poni Island.
